name: Dolce Vita Latte
preparation: In a cup or mug, stir mix with hot water until dissolved.
Pour milk into a large microwave-safe measuring cup. Microwave on high, 1 min, or until milk starts to bubble. Using a milk frother or whisk, beat until frothy.
Pour frothed milk into cup. Drizzle with Caramel Sauce, if desired.
tips: Try it iced! Stir 1 heaping tbsp mix into 1⁄2 cup hot water to dissolve. Add 1⁄2 cup cold milk and pour over ice. Serve blended or drizzled with Caramel Sauce or Chocolate Fudge Sauce, if desired.
